title: Executive Order 8377-Amending Executive Order No. 8356 Entitled "Rules of Precedence Relating to Foreign Service Officers and Other Officers of the United States Government"
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by section 1752 of the Revised Statutes of the United States (22 U.S.C. § 132), it is ordered that Executive Order No. 8356, of March 2, 1940, entitled "Rules of Precedence Relating to Foreign Service Officers and Other Officers of the United States Government," be, and it is hereby, amended by the substitution of the word "Foreign" for the word "Federal" in section 5 thereof.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8377-Amending Executive Order No. 8356 Entitled "Rules of Precedence Relating to Foreign Service Officers and Other Officers of the United States Government" Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371919
